name: RUN. (VChillYT)
description:
Run and find the elevator. they won't stop chasing you. even if they stop, keep going. they aren't stopping for your benefit.

choose between Mike Wizowzow, Shado, Luigi, Statue to run away from. WAY More monster and characters will be added to the game. it's in beta. request to add a character in the comments. :)

WASD - movement

Space - jump

CTRL - slide

F - flashlight

RMB - Zoom in
